review: It does everything that everything else I have already does. I got apple tv as a gift for x-mas, thought it sounded cool and got to setting it up right away. Set up was easy enough and I thought this might be a cool new piece of technology. But it's not. My wii does everything this does, so does my tv and my blue ray player. The only difference is that I can stream music to my tv and listen to it on crappie flat screen speakers, and I can see what's on my computer screen right now. But guess what, my iPod plugs directly into my stereo system, and seeing what's on my computer screen is pointless. I cancelled Netflix a long time ago and have no plans of subscribing to Hulu in the future. In order to make this thing do anything you have to subscribe to a variety of different services so be prepared to spend a lot. And why would I pay 3 bucks to rent a movie on iTunes when they are a dollar at the redbox down the street? If you want to buy something that requires you to spend even more money to make it work than this is the product for you. Pointless.
